programme.title: Better Plan for Better Life
programme.desc: In the new era of intelligent manufacturing, scientific and technological achievement intertwine with family life through high-speed rail, smart homes, global online shopping, convenient smart phone mobile platforms, and cashless payments.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi and Zhuang Yuan are forced into a blind date at a café. While playing along, secretly they are discussing Jiang Yi. Huang Ying Zi finds Jiang Yi's actions a bit cryptic.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi recalls the day they played Truth or Dare when Jiang Yi chose not to reveal his answer. In hindsight, Huang Ying Zi realizes that Jiang Yi might be the one she truly has a crush on.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Yu Ting feels uneasy that Chen Shi's family is going on an overseas trip then gets into a car accident. Mr. Pang, who was with Yu Ting, informs Chen Shi. Chen Shi rushes to the hospital and hugs Yu Ting tightly, Mr. Pang is stunned at the sight. Yu Ting chooses not to repress her feelings any longer and decides to stay beside Chen Shi no matter what.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li has a face-off with Yu Ting. Yu Ting tries to taunt Lin Li by telling her how well she and Chen Shi suit each other - working well and having similar interests. However, Lin Li tells Yu Ting about her 15 years of marriage to Chen Shi, and that the two have definitely been through more than Chen Shi and Yu Ting have; Yu Ting argues that all these are in the past.

programme.title: Ghost Soldier Borrowed
programme.desc: Detective Dee investigates a murder encountering eerie events and malevolent forces as he delves deeper into the case.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Experience Jake Pinnick’s extraordinary odyssey from Wudang Mountain, an acclaimed UNESCO World Heritage site and birthplace of Taoist martial arts, to mastering ancient kung fu and Taoist music, forging a transcultural bridge between Eastern and Western civilizations through the universal wisdom of Taoist philosophy.

programme.title: Gold Medal Protection
programme.desc: Tong Song, a man disabled in both legs, is the founder of the Maodun Security Company whose primary business is safeguarding clients' personal and financial security. One day, they receive a three-day anonymous assignment to protect one of his team member's sister. As she starts experiencing a series of accidents, Tong Song suspects these incidents are not coincidental.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: The little prince develops a rash and Xi Wan Ru is suspected of feeding wine to him which results in the wet nurse to be beaten to death.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Wang Xuan is eager and determined to have a child, despite the physician's warning that it is extemely risky.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Chi-tung discovers the truth and decides to keep quiet.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Based on Yee-ting’s statement, Inspector Lau approaches Lai-kei and questions her.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi has a gathering at her house to celebrate Jiang Yi's new job. A power outage occurs and they recall the time there was a power outage when they were 18 years old.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi knows that Ding Ye graduated from the school that Zhuang Yuan teaches at. To understand Ding Ye on a deeper level, she finds Zhuang Yuan for help.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Chen Shi realises that Lin Li is ill and requires surgery; he feels guilty and is unable to abandon her. News of Yu Ting and Chen Shi's relationship surfaces at the tuition centre, leaving Yu Ting with no choice but to resign. Yu Ting asks Chen Shi about the future plans and he tells her that he cannot abandon Lin Li right now as she is ill, leaving Yu Ting disappointed.

programme.desc: Tong Song, a man disabled in both legs, is the founder of the Maodun Security Company whose primary business is safeguarding clients' personal and financial security. One day, they receive a three-day anonymous assignment to protect one of his team member's sister. As she starts experiencing a series of accidents, Tong Song suspects these incidents are not coincidental.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Despite living with Spinal Muscular Atrophy, Ben Lou transcends physical limitations through his extraordinary brilliance in mathematics and physics. He shares his inspiring journey, showcasing how resilience and intellect have turned adversity into a catalyst for groundbreaking innovation.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Noelle visits the Chengdu Taste and Beijing Restaurant to experience the most authentic Sichuan flavor and Beijing snacks.
